Does this mean that Clean is not working?

It means clean is not working when an IAdaptable object is selected that does
not adapt to IResource. If you select something in the navigator or packages
view, or select nothing, clean should work.

Assigning to MVM. I sent a request to platform-ui-dev to release the patch, but
no response.
